mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Checklist of the Dermestidae (Coleoptera: Bostrichoidea) of Iran

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution in Iran : Generally distributed (Farahbakhsh 1961; Modarres Awal 1997), no locality cited (Háva 2007a; Herrmann et al. 2010).
Distribution outside Iran : Cosmopolitan species ( Háva 2015a ).
Hosts: Herbaria, entomological and zoological collections, wool, skin, silk, and other products (Farahbakhsh 1961; Modarres Awal 1997).
Distribution in Iran : No locality cited (Zhantiev 1976; Tezcan et al. 2004; Háva 2007a, 2015a; Herrmann et al. 2010).

New material: Razavi Khorasan , Bardeskan ( Herrmann coll.)
.
Distribution outside Iran : Turkey , Egypt , Libya , Tunisia , Israel , Syria ( Háva 2015a ).
